course_title: Modern Korean Short Fiction - MOD KORN SHRT FC

sections.comments: All students are required to complete a placement interview prior to registration. For upcoming interview dates and further information, please go to our website at www.asia.ubc.ca to view under "Placement exams".If this course is blocked please sign up for the waitlist section. Students will be placed into the class based off our department priority guidelines. For more information please visit: http://www.asia.ubc.ca/undergraduate/department-wait-lists/ (Is the class blocked even though there are a few seats that are free? This is normal. Please check our website for what this means.)

All students are required to complete a placement interview prior to registration. For upcoming interview dates and further information, please go to our website at www.asia.ubc.ca to view under "Placement exams".Registering for this section does not mean you are enrolled in the course, this is a waitlist section. Students will be moved off the waitlist into the course automatically once there is space. description: Reading and translating twentieth-century Korean short fiction.
